title: Mourning In Riyadh: Obama Visits New Saudi King To Offer Condolences
teaser: President Obama has stopped in Saudi Arabia on his way home from India. He's meeting with the new Saudi king. Steve Inskeep talks to NPR's Scott Horsley, who is traveling with the President.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
